body.name: Microfiber Spray Mops for Floor Cleaning - BPAWA Wood Floor Mop with Spray Flat Dust Mop for Hardwood Laminate Tile Ceramic Kitchen Floors, Dry Wet Mop with 2X 550ML Bottles 4X Reusable Washable Pads
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 7 mins
features: [Upgrade Spray Mops for Floor Cleaning]: This is a newest BPAWA Microfiber floor mop for cleaning with high quality and comfortable design. The floor cleaning mop is not only wireless and need no batteries, but also can sprays easier, less bulky, and the wet jet mop with 2 spray bottles can use your preferred solution. Easy to use on most flat surfaces, designed with premium material and abundant accessories, better for environment and saves money, such a microfiber mop must be what you want.

[Dry & Wet Mop with Superfine Sprayer]: Our floor cleaner mop is designed with a superfine mist sprayer that can strictly control the water output, just press the floor mop handle lightly, it will generate a fan-shaped fine mist that radiates widely on floor, and the floor dries immediately after mopping.The spray mop can instead of all wet mops & dry mops,it also fit for most hard-surfaces, such as wood, hardwood, laminate, tile, ceramic, vinyl, marble,glass,stone, bamboo, cement floors etc.

[2Pcs 550ML Large Capacity Water Tank]: The spray mop with washable pads comes with Two 550ml large capacity bottles, which are neither too big to increase the weight of the wet mops for floor cleaning, nor too small to satisfy floor cleaner for mopping. The second bottle of the spray mop for floors can be used as a backup, or it can hold a different liquid from the first mop bottle as a replacement, it means your can add your favorite solutions without impurities with the spray mop reservoirs.

[4x Washable Microfiber Refill Pads]:The spray floor mop for hardwood floor cleaning provides 4 reusable replacement cloths,which are machine washable up to 100 times and super absorption, durable and economical,so that can provide excellent cleaning for household work.The microfiber mop heads can easily attach to the flat floor mop head with velcro and can be removed effortlessly.The dust mop pads can easily absorb most dirt on hard floors,such as sewage,hair,animal hair,dust,solid debris,etc.

[Flexible Rotation & Ergonomic Design]:The flat mop head of the wood floor mop with spray can be swiveled flexibly,connected to lightweight and thickened sturdy aluminum alloy pole,which makes the squirty mop about 46in long,allows the tile floor mop easily reach to narrow spaces and deep corners such as under sofa,bed,cabinet and other furniture,even can reach to high glass window,wall and ceilings without bend over.So the refillable spray mop not only very practical but also good for health.

[Attention Tips]:①Because each spray mop has be spray function tested before sent,a small amount of water may remain in bottle is normal phenomenon.②Please clean the water tank and spray nozzle of the floor mop after use to keep it clean and protected.③Please don't fill boiling or impurity water, strong acid,alkali detergent into the bottle of the wet jet mop.④Please fully dilute solutions with plain water,because overly concentrated solutions may corrode mop internal parts or some floor types.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BPAWA Professional Spray Mop with Washable Pads for Hard Floor Cleaning - Friendly to Your Dear Kids and Pets As BPAWA grows, our designers are still working hard to create more. In order to let customers have a better experience, we not only retained the previous advantages of the 550ML microfiber spray mop for floor cleaning, but also made some upgrades and improvements. This spray floor mop not only has all the functions of most wet and dry mop, but is also very friendly to all your family members, it saves more physical energy, time, resource and money compared to traditional mops. Believe you will like it.

2 × 550ML Large Water Tank - Let's forget the bulky buckets Advantages:Two high capacity bottles of the wet mops for floor cleaning allow you to add different solutions at the same time,with them you can easily clean all rooms without carry heavy buckets or run around repeatedly. Applicable solution:With these reservoirs of our refillable floor mops for cleaning, you can use most of your fully diluted cleaning solutions as you like, such as ordinary neutral detergent, vinegar, essential oil. [Attention Tips]: Because each spray mop has be spray function tested before sent,a small amount of water may remain in bottle is normal phenomenon.Please clean the water tank and spray nozzle of the floor mop after use to keep it clean and protected.Please don't fill boiling or impurity water, strong acid,alkali detergent into the bottle of the wet jet mop.It is not recommended to add bleach directly into the mop bottle, it can be used after dipping it with a mop pad.Please fully dilute solutions with plain water,because overly concentrated solutions may corrode mop internal parts or some floor types.

REUSABLE FUNCTIONAL CLEANING ACCESSORIES 4PCS Replacement Microfiber Pads The 4 reusable mop heads in the hardwood floor mop kit are soft durable and super adsorbent, giving you a continuously smooth scratch-free scrub mopping experience, leaving floors clean and dry without water spots. Its strong velcro design makes the washable mop cloths more convenient and quick to use. Practical Multifunctional Scraper The laminate floor mop also features a multi-purpose scraper that you can use its serrated edge and flat edge to clean dust,hair,debris and other grime from the microfiber mop pads after all your mopping works. You can also combine its brush and spade head to remove stubborn stains from any hard surface. Machine Washable & Easy to Clean After simple cleaning with scraper,used mop heads of the wet spray mop for floors can be easily machine or hand washed.They are long lasting and washable up to 100times and more economical than traditional disposable cleaning pads,which are good cleaning helper to save time, physical energy and money.

Make Daily Life More Comfortable Our spray mops for floor cleaning are not only easy to install and use, but also has no wires or batteries, and is noiseless to use, no worries about disturbing the elderly or children. Compared with many traditional mops, it can bring you a more safe and comfortable mop cleaning experience, both mentally and physically. Package Included: 1 × Ergonomic handle; 1 × Aluminum alloy pole; 2 × 550ml Refillable bottle; 1 × Spray nozzle module with connector; 1 × 360° Rotating flat mop head; 4 × Reusable washable microfiber mop pads for replacement; 1 × Practical Scraper.

EASY TO USE FOR HOUSEHOLD CLEANING Household Wet & Dry Mops Wet use: the floor mop with spray can be a bathroom mop or kitchen mop to remove oil stains,dirty prints or water spots.Dry use: the spray mop for floors can be a dry dusting mop to easily absorb dust, debris, human hair and animal hair, etc. 360° Swivel Floor Mops 180° rotation back&forth: you don't need to bend over with this floor mop,just mopping forward and backward with one hand.180° rotation left&right: you can control the forward direction of the wooden floor mop at will to reduce your body rotation. Ergonomic Design Flat Mops Ergonomic comfort handle:gives more you control over your tile floor mop, you can can glide and mop the floor lightheartedly.Ultra-slim trapezoidal mop head:let the flat floor mop easily reach to narrow space in your home for more thorough cleaning. Superfine Mist Spray Mops Wide coverage fan-shaped mist: allows you to quickly clean the floor in a wide range with the spray mop, saving time and effort.Evenly and fast water output: makes the floor to dry immediately after mopping with the floor mop without water accumulation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better than WetJet.
reviews.reviewText: My WetJet wasn't working properly, so I figured I'd give this a try. Was inexpensive enough and I am tired of spending a fortune on the WetJet solution and pads. It snaps together easily and no batteries. It came with 2 bottles and you add your own cleaning product and water and pop it in. No drips or leaks. The reusable microfiber pads (4) are far better and thicker than the flimsy WetJet pads and leave no streaking. I rinsed off the pad in the sink and DONE. Amazing product especially for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved this mop. I’ve already used it several times and it’s working fine. Very light, it spays the right amount of cleaning solution and the pads are good too. I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work fine and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Works fine on tile and hardwood floors. Feels a bit flimsy but does work and haven't had any issues. Comes with extra clothes for floors and clothes washed great without any shrinkage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beats Swiffer wet jet
reviews.reviewText: Better than Swiffer wet jet because you can refill the TWO containers that come with the mop! And it comes with 4 microfiber, washable pads; in 2 different colors. Use 1 container for bleach/dawn/water mix- good for bathroom and kitchen floors. Use the 2nd container for water/Murphy's oil soap mix- great for hardwood floors and laminates. By having 2 different colored pads, they're easily switched out, according to which mixture I'm using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted the option to use two different solutions, water with a little vinegar for laminate flooring and a disinfectant for tile. This product seemed perfect, and two different colored pads was a real bonus. Unfortunately, the spray mechanism is just garbage. It's easy to put together, and the first 20 or 30 times you use the spray trigger, it seems to work well. I stored it upright in a closet when not in use, and I didn't put harsh chemicals in it. The sprayer just doesn't work. Sometimes, if it's been sitting for a long time, it will give one normal spray. Then it's just leaky dribbles. It's completely unfit for its purpose. I even returned the first one they sent because of this issue and received a replacement. Same issue with the second. I had hoped it was just that I got a lemon. Maybe some of them work, but the quality control must be pretty poor for me to get two such lemons.I'm sorry I chose this product. Waste of money and time. I should have heeded the reviews that identified this problem. Now it's just a dust mop with a weird plastic receptacle, because it can't serve as a spray mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this spray mop
reviews.reviewText: This works great, it very study and sprays well. It’s very lightweight and has a good pole length. I like that I can use my own cleaner and the pads are absorbent and washable. They seem to hold up well in the washing machine as well. The head swivels well which makes maneuvering corners and furniture easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Solution bottle leak
reviews.reviewText: I love this, mop I bought it to do floors at my job easily. The only negative things I have to say is the handle is not very sturdy and the solution bottles leak, while inserted into the mop and while not inserted into the mop so you have to place them with the lid up and not leave them stored in the mop when I’m not using because solution won’t run out and while using the cleaning tool for the floor pads it’s snagged them, and made strings but it made it very easy to do the floors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received my mop today. I can’t say enough positive things about it! Used it on all my hardwood floors. The mop pads are easy to install, change & wash and the sprayer works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble, came with 4 pads for the base, and a spare detergent bottle. Has reduced cleaning time massively as no faffing with buckets, and as the floor is almost dry when you finish mopping there`s hardly any time when you can`t use the rooms. Wish I had bought one years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: these pads are perfect for swiffer users looking to reduce their carbon footprint/ looking for a sustainable option to the swiffer refills. I have literally been using the same pad since I got them and it looks as good as new still, and I can throw it in the washing machine to clean. love these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have used it once and found it much better than the squeegee mop that I had previously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Lightweight and does the job perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to the Microfibre Spray Mop, and I couldn't be happier with the results. There are several features that make this mop an excellent choice.1. it's incredibly lightweight, and hence not feeling too tired after cleaning sessions.2. Easy to use. The spray mechanism covers a quite a decent area of the floor, so you don't need to spray many times in order to clean just a small spot.3. One of the most impressive aspects is the durability of the replaceable Microfiber pads. They attach securely to the holder, ensuring they won't fall off like other mops I've used. Plus, the fact that they're machine washable adds to the convenience and saves money on disposable pads.All in all, love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Really strong pole! Easy to assemble & great performance! 🧽
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ordered this mop, as loved that you got spare pads with them, 5 in total which was handy for when they’re becoming a little worn or if your wanting to use different ones for different rooms, or simply just to have spares whilst washing the other. These were great quality nice and thick, and almost cushioned. Simple hook and loop system attaches to the bottom base of the mop. After having major brand spray mops it’s always annoying having to buy the replacement pads which can cost a fortune!Item arrived with very minimal assembly, simply click the parts into position, fill the bottle, attach a pad and away you go! The spray function worked really well and had good coverage with a super fine mist. Tried to show this on the video. The poles that are supplied are also quite thick meaning when your applying pressure it doesn’t feel like it’s going to snap at any given moment, unlike some other branded mops I’ve tried in the past ⚡️.These mops are also easy to disassemble as well if needed for storage meaning that it’s super convenient to store! The mops come in a range of accent colours and different coloured cleaning pads meaning you’re bound to find one that’s suitable for you and your colour taste!For the current price of £18.99 I think this is a great price to pay for the mop + 5 cleaning pads, and would recommend. ✅
